attributes.action: Recognise that there is no such thing as an average child  and scrap the 'Early Years Foundation Curriculum'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid of the current plan to introduce testing for the under 5s and let children be children for a couple of years before starting on the riduculous trend of continuous assessment. Divert all the money saved by not implementing these plans into more health visitors and worthwhile education programmes rather than put undue stress on both parents and children
